title: [Large-scale] Hypermedia-Based Microlearning Design for Nursing Education

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational nursing theories and basic patient care knowledge
context.additional_context: Utilizing mobile-optimized educational content for pre-service/in-service teachers

learning_goals: Learners can accurately explain the five-step obstetric risk classification system through hypermedia modules
Learners apply inclusive nursing approaches to real-world situations using interactive content based on simulated scenarios
Learners achieve 80% or more mastery of learning content through self-assessment quizzes developed for mobile environments
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
